explanation: [0-0] A stick figure wearing a black tie is lying in bed, covered with a quilt, holding a mobile phone.

[0-3] Then the screen switches to the phone screen, which displays a series of times: 4:45 AM, 5:00 AM, 5:05 AM, 5:10 AM, 5:15 AM. A left hand is holding the phone, and a right index finger is tapping on the screen, selecting 5:00 AM, 5:05 AM, 5:10 AM, and 5:15 AM as alarms in turn, then putting down the phone and turning over to sleep.

[0-3] Then the screen switches to the phone screen, which displays a series of times: 4:45 AM, 5:00 AM, 5:05 AM, 5:10 AM, 5:15 AM. A left hand is holding the phone, and a right index finger is tapping on the screen, selecting 5:00 AM, 5:05 AM, 5:10 AM, and 5:15 AM as alarms in turn, then putting down the phone and turning over to sleep.

[0-3] Then the screen switches to the phone screen, which displays a series of times: 4:45 AM, 5:00 AM, 5:05 AM, 5:10 AM, 5:15 AM. A left hand is holding the phone, and a right index finger is tapping on the screen, selecting 5:00 AM, 5:05 AM, 5:10 AM, and 5:15 AM as alarms in turn, then putting down the phone and turning over to sleep.

[3-7] Then the picture brightens, the camera zooms in, the phone screen displays 5:00 AM, a finger reaches out to turn off the alarm, the stick figure wearing a black tie continues to sleep, then the phone screen displays 5:05 AM, the stick figure wearing a black tie turns over to turn off the alarm, and then goes back to sleep.

[3-7] Then the picture brightens, the camera zooms in, the phone screen displays 5:00 AM, a finger reaches out to turn off the alarm, the stick figure wearing a black tie continues to sleep, then the phone screen displays 5:05 AM, the stick figure wearing a black tie turns over to turn off the alarm, and then goes back to sleep.

[3-7] Then the picture brightens, the camera zooms in, the phone screen displays 5:00 AM, a finger reaches out to turn off the alarm, the stick figure wearing a black tie continues to sleep, then the phone screen displays 5:05 AM, the stick figure wearing a black tie turns over to turn off the alarm, and then goes back to sleep.

[3-7] Then the picture brightens, the camera zooms in, the phone screen displays 5:00 AM, a finger reaches out to turn off the alarm, the stick figure wearing a black tie continues to sleep, then the phone screen displays 5:05 AM, the stick figure wearing a black tie turns over to turn off the alarm, and then goes back to sleep.

[7-10] Then the picture switches to the room, you can see that it is dawn outside, there are trees outside the window, and other people are exercising. Another stick figure is lying in bed with his eyes open, his eyebrows and eyes moving slightly. Then the alarm clock rings, and a hand reaches out from behind the stick figure with open eyes and turns off the alarm clock. Then the screen switches to above the bed, where two stick figures appear on the bed, the stick figure with open eyes frowns, arms holding his head and looking at the stick figure wearing a black tie, with an angry face.

[7-10] Then the picture switches to the room, you can see that it is dawn outside, there are trees outside the window, and other people are exercising. Then the alarm clock rings, and a hand reaches out from behind the stick figure with open eyes and turns off the alarm clock. Then the screen switches to above the bed, where two stick figures appear on the bed, the stick figure with open eyes frowns, arms holding his head and looking at the stick figure wearing a black tie, with an angry face.

[10-17] Then the picture switches to a door, the mobile phone breaks out of the door, smashing a hole in the door. The picture cuts back to the stick figure with open eyes, who closes his eyes with satisfaction and falls asleep. Then the picture switches to the mobile phone, which continues to rotate in the air, and then the alarm clock rings, displaying 5:15 AM. Then the picture switches to the stick figure who just closed his eyes suddenly opens his eyes, his eyeballs red. Then the picture cuts to the door again, the stick figure wearing a black tie breaks out of the door in a sleeping position, the debris of the door flying everywhere, then the stick figure wearing a black tie comes to the side of the mobile phone, the mobile phone alarm rings, the stick figure wearing a black tie turns off the alarm and continues to sleep, the mobile phone and the stick figure continue to fly in the air.
